members.joinCircumstances: Founded the crew by declaring his intention to become Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Pirates Founded
keyMoments.description: Luffy declares his intention to become Pirate King, effectively founding what will become the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The beginning of the crew that will change the world.

ships.description: Luffy doesn't have a ship yet in this episode.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
